resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Tenor. <span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;">Je ne perdray ma pacience/<span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">Et ne penseray lascheté.
resource.chars: Tenor. Je ne perdray ma pacience/Et ne penseray lascheté.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M190.73596,463.52139h730.02406v0h730.02406v330.37834v330.37834h-730.02406h-730.02406v-330.37834z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_65d7df70-13d3-4054-a5b5-a439dbd77391" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: J’ay bien maulgré ta maffieureté,/J’ay ris de ta diversité,/J’ay plaisir de ton actanance,/J’ay fierté contre ta puissance,/Car tout me vient de loyaulté. Fortune [...]
resource.chars: J’ay bien maulgré ta maffieureté,/J’ay ris de ta diversité,/J’ay plaisir de ton actanance,/J’ay fierté contre ta puissance,/Car tout me vient de loyaulté. Fortune [...]
